report.title: Sample media name checking report
report.description: Report allows experts to provide a corrected name of a (user entered) sample media item.
report.query:
SELECT #columns# FROM indicia.cache_samples_functional csf JOIN indicia.cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id
JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_entered_species on sav_entered_species.sample_id = csf.id AND sav_entered_species.sample_attribute_id = #entered_species_smp_attr_id# AND sav_entered_species.deleted = false
JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_entered_species on ctt_entered_species.id = sav_entered_species.int_value
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_entered_species_other on sav_entered_species_other.sample_id = csf.id AND sav_entered_species_other.sample_attribute_id = #entered_species_other_option_smp_id# AND sav_entered_species_other.deleted = false
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_corrected_species on sav_corrected_species.sample_id = csf.id AND sav_corrected_species.sample_attribute_id = #corrected_species_smp_attr_id# AND sav_corrected_species.deleted = false
WHERE #sharing_filter# AND csf.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND csnf.media IS NOT NULL

param.name: entered_species_smp_attr_id
param.description: Sample attribute ID that holds the entered species termlists_term the user entered

param.name: other_entered_species_tt_id
param.display: Termlists_term ID for the species Other option
param.description: Termlists_term ID for the Other species option

param.name: entered_species_other_option_smp_id
param.display: Entered Species Other optionsample attribute ID
param.description: Sample attribute ID that holds the Other option text entered by the user

param.name: corrected_species_smp_attr_id
param.description: Sample attribute ID that holds the corrected species entered by an expert

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of Survey IDs to limit report to.

report.columns: -- Leave an empty cell on grid for expert entry
